EmailTemplate.subject: Upgrade Your BK117 with Airwork
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.airwork.co.nz/]]>
Take flight with the tried and true LTS101-850B-2 engine
Take your aircraft to new heights with the LTS101-850B-2 upgrade, which offers an economical way to meet Category A/Class 1 requirements while improving performance, safety and reliability. It is the most powerful version of Honeywellâ€™s proven LTS101 engine family, which has logged more than 11 million service hours since its introduction.
So, choose one of the most comprehensive helicopter maintenance, repair and overhaul facilities in the world and upgrade to the LTS101-850B-2 engine with Airwork.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/BK117_LTS101.html]]>
